name: Soap Sampler Gift Set
description:
The perfect Mother's Day Gift for that special someone!

This sampler set includes 8 sample size soaps in my best selling scents. The gift set comes as pictured, tied with a ribbon. All of my soaps are natural and scented only with essential oils. Each soap weighs approximately 1.5 ounces. The following soaps are included:

Activated Charcoal
Lavender mint splash
Karmic Gold
Dead Sea Mud Soap
Cinnamon Honey & Almond
French Red Clay
Oatmeal & Honey
Rosemary Nettle

If you would like it sent directly to the recipient, please let me know what you would like the card to say in notes to seller. Gift wrapping is now available. Choose the gift wrap option when you check out and your sampler set will be wrapped in silver or gold paper with coordinating bow and gift tag. If you do not choose gift wrapping, your gift will come with a bow and gift tag. If you would rather choose your own scents, put the scent choices inÂ the notes section when checking out or send me a note.

Thanks
